name: Sol (sinananan)
description:
Hey guys!

Thanks for playing my game! 

This is a short, poignant journey about the discovery of self, told through the eyes of an unusual protagonist. 

It's my first ever game jam entry, made in 7 days for the 3rd BTP jam. Due to the fact that I think I missed something with the scaling settings, you'll have to play this in full screen. But don't worry! I think the experience is even better that way!

Also there is a rare bug during dialogue moments which prevents the player from progressing. I thought I had solved it but apparently it has happened since then. Unfortunately, the only way to get around this is to restart, but since it's a short game I hope you're willing to do so. I would appreciate it. That being said, it is a very rare issue so you're unlikely to encounter it.

Hope you enjoy! 

PS. Please leave a comment. I'm eager for constructive criticism (though I'd prefer to be showered with praise, however unlikely that is) and I want to learn to be better. Everything teaches me something. Thanks.
